title: ARYL DIPHOSPHINES AND CATALYSTS CONTAINING THE SAME
abstract: The present invention provides novel aryl diphosphines having formula (I) wherein X, Y, R1-18, m, m' and n are defined herein, and which can be complexed with a transition metal to form a novel catalyst useful in such applications as hydroformylation.

motivations: There is a need for novel catalysts to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of chemical reactions such as hydroformylation.
objectives: Develop novel aryl diphosphines that can be complexed with transition metals to form effective catalysts.
methods: Design and synthesize aryl diphosphines with specific structural features defined by formula (I).
Complex the aryl diphosphines with transition metals to form novel catalysts.
results: Create novel catalysts useful for applications such as hydroformylation.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of novel aryl diphosphines and catalysts for improved chemical reactions

motivations: There is a need for novel aryl diphosphines that can be complexed with a transition metal to form a new catalyst.
objectives: Provide novel aryl diphosphines with a specific formula.
Develop a new catalyst by complexing the novel aryl diphosphines with a transition metal.
methods: Synthesize novel aryl diphosphines with a specific formula.
Complex the synthesized aryl diphosphines with a transition metal to form a new catalyst.
results: A new catalyst useful in applications such as hydroformylation is developed.

motivations: There is a need for novel catalysts that can effectively facilitate chemical reactions such as hydroformylation.
objectives: Develop novel aryl diphosphines that can be complexed with transition metals to create new catalysts.
methods: Synthesize aryl diphosphines with specific structural formula and complex them with transition metals.
results: Novel catalysts are created that are useful for applications including hydroformylation reactions.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Novel aryl diphosphine ligands and their transition metal catalysts
